name: Andrew Garfield

structured_info.background: A British-American actor trained at the Royal Central School of Speech and Drama, Garfield gained recognition for roles in films like *Boy A*, *The Social Network*, and *The Amazing Spider-Man*. He has received nominations for an Academy Award and a Tony Award, and is known for his intense and nuanced performances. His grandparents were Jewish immigrants to London.

summary: Andrew Garfield is a highly acclaimed English-American actor best known for his portrayal of Peter Parker/Spider-Man, as well as roles in critically acclaimed films and stage productions. He has received multiple awards and nominations for his work and is regarded for his dedication to complex character work.

name: Andy Garfield

structured_info.background: This Andy Garfield is distinguished from actor Andrew Garfield.

summary: Andy Garfield is a composer who is differentiated from the actor Andrew Garfield.

name: Lynn Garfield

structured_info.background: Born in Essex, England, and currently resides in Los Angeles, California.

summary: Lynn Garfield is the mother of actor Andrew Garfield. She was born in Essex, England and now lives in Los Angeles, California.

name: Richard Garfield

structured_info.background: Richard Garfield is an emigrant from the United Kingdom who relocated to the United States.

summary: Richard Garfield is best known as the father of actor Andrew Garfield. He emigrated to the United States from the United Kingdom.

name: Jonathan Larson

structured_info.background: Jonathan Larson is known as the inspiration and subject of the musical drama *Tick, Tick... Boom!*, portrayed by Andrew Garfield.

summary: Jonathan Larson is a figure central to the musical *Tick, Tick... Boom!*, with his life and work brought to the screen in a recent film adaptation.
